Create a new realm attribute

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"realm","description":"realm name (not id!)","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"style":"simple"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"JSON body","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string"},"value":{"type":"string"},"realm":{"type":"string"}},"title":"RealmAttributeRepresentation"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
